results.tagline: The spirits are very much in your favor!
result_choices: They are rejoicing ‘[keyword1] with [crypto1]’. Rejoice with them and invest!
Does it get any better than this? [keyword1] with [crypto1] and [keyword2] with [crypto2]. Go play the lottery while you’’re at it!
The spirits are crying ‘[keyword1]’ in regard to [crypto1]. Either stay far away, or invest in some on behalf of an enemy.
With [keyword1] and [keyword2] surrounding all matters involving both [crypto1] and [crypto2], maybe stay away, and light some sage for good measure.
The spirits believe ‘[keyword1]’ sums up what’’s currently at play with [crypto1]. It seems to be a good thing!
If you knew that spirits are associating [keyword1] and [keyword2] with both [crypto1] and [crypto2], would you invest in either? This seems to be the case.
If [keyword1] is at all relevant in your life currently, by all means, take care of that first before getting involved with [crypto1].
With [keyword1], [keyword2], and a few other related terms at work here, the spirits suggest avoiding [crypto1] altogether, and waiting on [crypto2] for at least two weeks.
